alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Boone County Except Southwest; Marion (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 6:11AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Marion, northeastern Boone and northwestern Baxter Counties through 645 AM CDT... At 610 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lead Hill, or 15 miles west of Bull Shoals, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bull Shoals... Lakeview in Baxter County... Diamond City... Lead Hill... Arkawana... Price Place... Ozark Isle... Fawn Park... Winington... Bull Shoals State Park... Ozark Regional Airport... Midway in Baxter County... South Lead Hill... Clarkridge... Monarch... Oakland... Peel... Three Brothers... Bull Shoals Lake... Norfork Lake... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baxter; Boone County Except Southwest; Marion
